revised_title: Revolution in Cement Technology: Advances and Opportunities in the 1990s
tldr: This article discusses the challenges and opportunities in the cement and concrete industry in the 1990s. It highlights the need for advancements in research, improved standards, and specialized education to make cements and concretes more uniform and predictable materials. The authors predict a revolution in cement technology driven by the integration of research efforts, advances in telecommunications, and the application of computers to materials characterization.
